targets.expr:
sum(rate(app_retrieve_permissions_from_caa_seconds_sum{ namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", pod=~"$pod"}[15m]))
/ sum(rate(app_retrieve_permissions_from_caa_seconds_count{ namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", pod=~"$pod"}[15m]))

sum(rate(app_read_mfa_card_credentials_seconds_sum{ namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", pod=~"$pod"}[15m]))
/ sum(rate(app_read_mfa_card_credentials_seconds_count{ namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", pod=~"$pod"}[15m]))

sum(rate(app_write_mfa_card_credentials_seconds_sum{ namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", pod=~"$pod"}[15m]))
/ sum(rate(app_write_mfa_card_credentials_seconds_count{ namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", pod=~"$pod"}[15m]))

sum(rate(app_read_visa_dps_card_information_seconds_sum{ namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", pod=~"$pod"}[15m]))
/sum(rate(app_read_visa_dps_card_information_seconds_count{ namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", pod=~"$pod"}[15m]))

sum(rate(app_read_visa_dps_cvv2_seconds_sum{ namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", pod=~"$pod"}[15m]))
/sum(rate(app_read_visa_dps_cvv2_seconds_count{ namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", pod=~"$pod"}[15m]))
sum by (uri, status) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{uri!~".*actuator.*",  namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", pod=~"$pod"}[15m]))
avg(jvm_threads_daemon or jvm_threads_daemon_threads{ namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", pod=~"$pod"})
avg(jvm_threads_peak or jvm_threads_peak_threads{ namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", pod=~"$pod"})

panels.title: Async Executor Service Thread Pool Size

targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="heap",  namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", pod=~"$pod"})*100/sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{area="heap",  namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", pod=~"$pod"})
